short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Campaign verifier for Kickstarter and Indiegogo crowdfunding platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kudos Crowdfunding Campaign Verifier it's a synergy of area experts with cool algorithms to help people verify crowdfunding campaigns and warn about fraud and high risks projects.
